p:
BLASTp program ( https://blast.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/Blast.cgi)
37 was employed to expound the existence of sequence homology between the conserved regions identified in the alpha viruses and the human proteome. The search set was limited to Homo sapiens (taxid: 9606) in the UniProtKB/Swiss-Prot database. Default BLASTp algorithm parameters were used and the results were limited only to the top 100 hits.
